description: {"blocks":[{"key":"frbhe","text":"This protocol allows for the detection of evoked or tonic dopamine release from human iPSC-derived dopamine neurons using High-Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) coupled to electrochemical detection. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"f6jsv","text":"This assay can be performed on any mature iPSC-derived dopamine neurons (DANs), but success has been particularly found on iPSC-DANs that have been grown in culture for 50-90 days following a modified Krik’s protocol. Optimal density found to be plated at 500 000 / well in a 24 well cell culture dish. Collected samples can be stored long-term at -80oC.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":351,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":192,"length":24}],"data":{}},{"key":"b2b5u","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qa22","text":"All steps are performed at Room Temperature (RT).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FABE70DC30C443A8B6B8675D900B614B","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.q26g7y1jqgwz/v1"}}}}

parent_collections.title: Do, Q. B. et al. (2023) Early deficits in an in vitro striatal microcircuit model carrying the Parkinson’s GBA-N370S mutation

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"avdev","text":"Add 1 µL of perchloric acid (PCA) to a labelled light-protected 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube for each sample.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j7hu","text":"Prepare Ringers Buffers for tonic or evoked release (see Materials). Store short-term at 4°C.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":57,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54s6t","text":"Aspirate media from hiPSC-DANs plated as stated in guidelines. \n","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rpbe","text":"Wash hiPSC-DANs one time with 100 µL phosphate buffered saline (PBS).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cpl3r","text":"Collect Ringer’s Buffer in pre-labelled tubes containing PCA.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fk829","text":"Snap freeze on dry ice (optional). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18q9t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rp7b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":28,"style":"sup"}],"key":"crmkl","text":"Samples can be stored at -80oC long-term or immediately processed for HPLC.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de8l0","text":"If snap-frozen and stored at -80oC, thaw samples on ice. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":32,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sa77","text":"Run samples on HPLC column using a mobile phase running at 1 mL/min on a 4.6 x 150 mm Microsorb C18 reverse-phase column and Decade II ECD with a glassy carbon working electrode (Antec Layden) set at 0.7 V with respect to an Ag/AgCl reference electrode. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6dq2e","text":"Calculate concentrate of dopamine released in sample compared to known standards.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
